subject: Re: Re: Community Giveaway & Proposal for Closer Partnership
description_text:
*Subject: Successful Pedal Giveaway & Proposal for Extended Product Testing
Collaboration*

Dear Simsonn Team,

I wanted to follow up on our recent collaboration and share some excellent
news. The pedal set giveaway went extremely well - the winner was
absolutely thrilled and has already received their prize. The response has
been fantastic, and I'm expecting several orders to come through as a
result of this campaign.

Two observations worth mentioning:

   1. Many viewers are choosing to purchase through Amazon for convenience.
   It might be worth highlighting your direct ordering options in future
   communications to capture more direct sales.
   2. I've noticed that some customers are using the code "Cart10" (10%
   discount) instead of my affiliate code "Chuxl" (8% discount). While I
   understand customers naturally seek the best deal, it would be helpful if
   we could find a way to make the affiliate code more attractive or perhaps
   match the discount percentage to ensure proper tracking of our
   collaboration's success.

The review video has already achieved impressive engagement with nearly 400
views, 30 likes, and 16 comments - a strong start that shows the
community's interest in your products.

*Proposal for Extended Collaboration:*

Given this positive response, I'd like to propose expanding our
collaboration through comprehensive product testing. I would create:

   - Unboxing videos
   - Initial reviews
   - Long-term reviews after extended testing periods

*Products I could test:*

   - *Pedal Pro X*: Comparison video "Plus X Pedals vs Pedal Pro X" with
   unboxing, review, comparison, and long-term review
   - *Simsonn HB Pro Racing Simulator Handbrake*: Unboxing, review, and
   long-term testing
   - *SIMSONN PC USB 6+RH Shifter & 7+RH Shifter*: Unboxing, reviews, and
   long-term tests for both models

Additionally, I've received numerous inquiries during my streams about
whether you have a wheelbase in development, as viewers have noticed
something in the driver software. If this is something you're working on,
my audience would be very interested to learn more.

I'm confident we can build on this successful start to create even more
engaging content that showcases your products effectively.

Looking forward to discussing these opportunities further.

Best regards,

Pierre Lorenz

>

conversations.body_text: Hi Pierre Lorenz,     Thank you for your follow-up and for sharing such positive news about the giveaway. Weâ€™re very pleased to hear that the winner received the pedals and that the campaign has generated such strong engagement and interest within your community.  Regarding your observations:    Amazon purchases: Please note that orders placed on Amazon are not linked to our affiliate program, and customers are also unable to use discount codes there. Direct orders through our website remain the only way for affiliates to generate commissions and for customers to apply discount codes.    Discount codes: Even if customers use a different code, their orders will still be attributed to the affiliate link owner. This ensures your efforts are properly tracked, regardless of the discount used.    Wheelbase:Our wheelbase has already been developed, and we are currently refining the details. At this stage, we are focusing on thorough quality checks and after-sales reliability testing to ensure the best possible experience for our customers.    As for your proposal to expand content around other products, at this stage we do not have additional promotion campaigns planned. However, if new promotion opportunities arise in the future, we will be glad to prioritize you for collaboration.  We truly value the energy and dedication you bring to these projects and look forward to more exciting opportunities together.     Best regards, The Simsonn Team
